metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6211 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: If an attacker needed a user to load an insecure http: page and knew thatuser had enabled HTTPS-only mode, the attacker could have tricked the userinto clicking to grant an HTTPS-only exception if they could get the userto participate in a clicking game. This vulnerability affects Firefox <120.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
